name: Legend Red Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:Blood Orange, Sage, Mahogany Woods.Fragrance Description:Montblanc Legend Red Eau de Parfum is bolder and more determined than ever to make you feel confident, strong, and powerful. The new olfactory experience starts with the freshness of blood orange, is intensified by aromatic notes of clary sage, and finished in magnetic, woody accord. It is a charismatic, woody fragrance that makes the heart beat a little faster..About the Fragrance:For nearly a century, Montblanc has been celebrated as the paramount creator of writing instruments. The brand has since branched out to offer exquisite watches, leather pieces, jewelry, fragrances, and eyewear.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (Sd Alcohol 39-C), Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Bht, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Citronellol, Geraniol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citral.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Mostly underwhelmed. I think it smells like cheap axe cologne and with that, it‘s more suitable for a younger demographic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample in our order. The hubs reluctantly tried it on only to realize he loves the smell and how I react to him wearing it.  It has a light leather smell with spices. Needless to say we will be ordering some of this cologne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Other reviewers basically say it’s not loud enough, but that’s the point.  The notes are of leather that turns into pepper.  It’s clean and masculine without smelling so much like generic cologne.  My favorite after a full day of sniffing and proud of my choice that I talked my husband into and he agrees.

reviews.review_title: Sample provided- not selected by me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t select this at the time of purchase. I don’t know who thought a men’s sample cologne a good equivalent to Moroccan Oil or Sol de Janeiro, but here we are. This men’s cologne isn’t bad. The fragrance hits all of the notes referenced in the description and does appeal.  It honestly becomes harder and harder for me to want to maintain Rouge status with Sephora. There is almost always a significant price difference (not in the buyers favor) compared to the actual product/company site, but then to add insult to injury, they’re miserly with samples, promos, etc…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell, this is good for everyday, you smell good but you not doing the most. Good for a teenage boy just getting into fragrances. I got a sample of this and gave it to my son. It’s a fresh everyday scent scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample with replacement order after my order did not arrive. This was selected by the customer service representative. It is way too loud and strong for me. I could not cover it up. Had to scub!

Very clean, crisp, masculine scent that is not overbearing. Great for a everyday scent. perfect for the young gentlemen just starting to wear cologne but doesn't want to smell cheap or to strong. Just the right amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A fragrance that starts off pretty citrusy and fresh at the beginning and then dries down to be smooth and delightful. There are many better fragrances but this is a great gym/everyday wear fragrance. Also great for teens or a youthful crowd.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: smelled good in store, bought online for my husband, he wore it a few times and it was just meh.. there's much better smellings colognes out there. ended up returning it.
